title: Real Food Daily - LAX
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Macrobiotic, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery
description: Opened on Dec 4, 2013 at the LAX airport, this is part of the Real Food Daily brand with locations in Southern California. All vegan food menu and vegan desserts. NOTE: One needs a boarding pass to reach it (Post-Security). Confirmed opne, Jan 2016, you can access this from T4, T5, and T6 (Tom Bradley).
